Title: Layout Designer
Description: A prototype WPF/Silverlight UI layout designer. Works with basic panels (StackPanel and Grid). Built entirely using drag-n-drop. XAML can be copied to clipboard. Built with Silverlight 4 and runs in the browser.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A prototype WPF/Silverlight UI layout designer. Works with basic panels (StackPanel and Grid). Built entirely using drag-n-drop. XAML can be copied to clipboard. Built with Silverlight 4 and runs in the browser.

Live Preview: http://layout.osenkov.com
